procedural_fairness: CIC not responsible for ensuring communication receipt unless evidence of failure exists
Applicant must prove non-receipt and ensure application completeness
decision_reasoning: Applicant failed to prove non-receipt and ensure application completeness
application_details: Applicant claimed non-receipt of a letter requesting documents but provided no proof
She partially fulfilled the request and assumed her application was complete after submitting one document
Her request for further notice was deemed insufficient to shift the burden
cause_of_action: Applicant's PR application was rejected for missing documentation
Judicial review claim of procedural unfairness
procedure_followed: Judicial review analyzed whether CIC met procedural fairness standards in rejecting the application
result_of_case: Finding no breach of procedural fairness
